title: VYNL Bikes Have Returned with US-Made Road, All-Road, and Gravel Frames
content: Making bikes has been difficult with the pandemic halting raw material production and making it difficult to build bikes in the USA but after a year-long hiatus, VYNL Bikes is back with three frame models, all US-made from 7005 aluminum tubing and in three models: rim brake road, disc road, and gravel disc. Each frame can be coated in dozens of color options and finishes, making your bike unique. Head on over to familiarize yourself with the new VYNL lineup!
author: prolly
